channel.title: Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Spring Boot (Multiple Products)
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Spring Boot Vulnerability Statement https://spring.io/blog/2021/12/10/log4j2-vulnerability-and-spring-boot Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-21 22:43:46 CISAGov Updated vendor link Spring Boot Vulnerability Statement.

item.title: Stackstate (Multiple Products)
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://support.stackstate.com/hc/en-us/articles/4412242847506-Apache-Log4j2-Remote-Code-Execution-RCE-Vulnerability-CVE-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Workaround NCSC-NL StackState ships with a version of Elasticsearch that contains a vulnerable Log4j library. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated communityVulnerable. Updated community note.

item.title: Stackstate Agent
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://support.stackstate.com/hc/en-us/articles/4412242847506-Apache-Log4j2-Remote-Code-Execution-RCE-Vulnerability-CVE-2021-44228 Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Workaround NCSC-NL StackState Agent distributed as an RPM, DEB or MSI package contains a vulnerable Log4j library. Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated communityVulnerable.
